docs.title: Welcome to The Book of RC
docs.text:
Helping people discover and thrive in the world of Remote Control (RC) vehicles.

This started as my keeping a notebook as I built my own 3D-printed RC truck. I thought it would be useful for others to follow along and learn from my experience. If you have any feedback, please contact me through a GitHub Issue in the public repository for this book.

(c) 2024 Matthew Alexander Manuel
